entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story who is experiencing a tingling sensation and is in a state of shock.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is writing a long letter by the fire.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is lying on the hearthrug trying to finish his Transfiguration homework.

entities.name: the eye of the snake
entities.description: An object that has a significant effect on Harry, causing him to be in a state of shock.

relationships.description: Harry is affected by 'The Eye of the Snake', which causes him to experience a tingling sensation and be in a state of shock.
Hermione is concerned for Harry's well-being, asking if he is all right.
Ron is also concerned for Harry's well-being, asking what kept him.
